divs: Sighting DetailsI woke up and noticed a bright light in the eastern ESE sky (I have a large wall of windows). It seemed too large to be a plane and it was only moving slightly but not going anywhere. I noticed that 15 minutes had passed and it was still there. It appeared to have metallic reflection as it caught some light. I tried several pair of eyeglasses to get the best view. I saw it through tree branches however it was maybe only the size of a BB. My first thought was, "what the heck is that?" I stared at it for about an hour, when it eventually it got higher in the sky and moved further away to about the size of a star. However hardly any other stars were noticeable by that time as it was getting to be daylight. So it appeared to move away from me going ESE.
Summary: Something too large for plane hung in sky for an hour before and at dawn then moved away
trends: There have been no other sightings in Edwards
This sighting has never been favorited.
